message:
well, i'm trying to transfer a file.  
i take 1024 bytes (as size as the buffer) from the file every time and send them.  
the first packet was sent successfully and the problem was in the second packet when i sent it, for some reason, the dataBuffer become null again, i don't know why but i think because of the line 197
